file.name: payments.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: https://api.mercadopago.com
info:
  title: Mercado Pago API Reference
  version: '1.0'
paths:
  /v1/payments:
    post:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-pro'
        - $ref: '#/tags/mobile-checkout'
        - $ref: '#/tags/subscriptions'
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-api'
      summary: Create payment
      x-summary-i18n:
        eng: Create payment
        spa: Crear pago
        por: Criar pagamento
      description: Create a payment and add all the information you need. Remember to add the payment details and the payer's information
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Create a payment and add all the information you need. Remember to add the payment details and the payer's information
        spa: Realiza la creación de un pago y agrega toda la información que necesites. Ten en cuenta de sumar el detalle del pago y los datos del pagador
        por: Crie um pagamento e acrescente todas as informações que você precisa. Certifique-se de acrescentar os detalhes do pagamento e os detalhes do cliente
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                additional_info:
                  type: object
                  description: Data that could improve fraud analysis and conversion rates. Try to send as much information as possible.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Data that could improve fraud analysis and conversion rates. Try to send as much information as possible.
                    spa: Información que puede mejorar el análisis de prevención de fraude y la tasa de conversión. Trata de enviarnos toda la infomación posible.
                    por: Informações que podem melhorar a análise de prevenção de fraude e a taxa de conversão. Trata de enviar-nos toda a informação possível.
                  properties:
                    ip_address:
                      type: string
                      description: 
                        IP from where the request comes from (only for bank transfers).
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: IP from where the request comes from (only for bank transfers).
                        spa: IP del cual proviene el request (sólo para transferencia bancaria)
                        por: IP do qual provém o request (apenas para transferência bancária)
                    items:
                      type: array
                      description: List of items to be paid.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: List of items to be paid.
                        spa: Lista de ítems a pagar
                        por: Lista de itens a pagar
                      items:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          id:
                            type: string
                            description: Item code.
                            x-description-i18n:
                              eng: Item code.
                              spa: Código de ítem
                              por: Código de anúncio
                            example: PR0001
                          title:
                            type: string
                            description: Item name.
                            x-description-i18n:
                              eng: Item name.
                              spa: Nombre de ítem
                              por: Nome do item
                            example: Point Mini
                          description:
                            type: string
                            description: Long item description.
                            x-description-i18n:
                              eng: Long item description.
                              spa: Descripción de item
                              por: Descrição do artigo
                            example: Producto Point para cobros con tarjetas mediante bluetooth
                          picture_url:
                            type: string
                            description: Image URL.
                            x-description-i18n:
                              eng: Image URL.
                              spa: URL de imagen
                              por: URL da imagem
                            example: https://http2.mlstatic.com/resources/frontend/statics/growth-sellers-landings/device-mlb-point-i_medium@2x.png
                          category_id:
                            type: string
                            description: Category of the item.
                            x-description-i18n:
                              eng: Category of the item.
                              spa: Categoría del ítem
                              por: Categoria do item
                            example: electronics
                          quantity:
                            type: number
                            description: Item quantity.
                            x-description-i18n:
                              eng: Item quantity.
                              spa: Cantidad de producto
                              por: Quantidade do produto
                            example: 1
                          unit_price:
                            type: number
                            description: Unit price.
                            example: 58.8
                    payer:
                      type: object
                      description: Buyer's information.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Buyer's information.
                        spa: Información del comprador
                        por: Informação do comprador
                      required: true
                      properties:
                        first_name:
                          type: string
                          description: Buyer's name.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Buyer's name.
                            spa: Nombre del comprador
                            por: Nome do comprador
                          example: Test
                        last_name:
                          type: string
                          description: Buyer's last name.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Buyer's last name.
                            spa: Apellido del comprador
                            por: Apelido do comprador
                          example: Test
                        phone:
                          type: object
                          description: Buyer's phone.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Buyer's phone.
                            spa: Teléfono del comprador
                            por: Telefone do comprador
                          properties:
                            area_code:
                              type: string
                              description: Area code.
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: Area code.
                                spa: Código de área
                                por: Código de área
                              example: 11
                            number:
                              type: string
                              description: Phone number.
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: Phone number.
                                spa: Número telefónico
                                por: Número de telefone
                              example: '987654321'
                        address:
                          type: object
                          description: Address.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Address.
                            spa: Dirección
                            por: Endereço
                          properties:
                            zip_code:
                              type: string
                              description: Zip code.
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: Zip code.
                                spa: Código postal
                                por: Código postal
                            street_name:
                              type: string
                              description: Street name.
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: Street name.
                                spa: Calle
                                por: Rua
                            street_number:
                              type: number
                              description: Number.
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: Number.
                                spa: Número
                                por: Número
                        registration_date:
                          type: string
                          format: date
                          description: Date of registration of the buyer on your site.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Date of registration of the buyer on your site.
                            spa: Fecha de registración del comprador en tu sitio
                            por: Data de cadastro do comprador em seu site
                    shipments:
                      type: object
                      description: Shipping information.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Shipping information.
                        spa: Información de envío
                        por: Informações de envio
                      properties:
                        receiver_address:
                          type: object
                          description: Buyer's address.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Buyer's address.
                            spa: Dirección del comprador
                            por: Endereço do comprador
                          properties:
                            zip_code:
                              type: string
                              description: Zip code.
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: Zip code.
                                spa: Código postal
                                por: Código postal
                              example: 12312-123
                            state_name:
                              type: string
                              description: State.
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: State.
                                spa: Provincia
                                por: Província
                              example: Rio de Janeiro
                            city_name:
                              type: string
                              description: City Name.
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: City Name.
                                spa: Ciudad
                                por: Cidade
                              example: Buzios
                            street_name:
                              type: string
                              description: Street name.
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: Street name.
                                spa: Calle
                                por: Rua
                              example: Av das Nacoes Unidas
                            street_number:
                              type: number
                              description: Number.
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: Number.
                                spa: Número
                                por: Número
                              example: 3003
                            floor:
                              type: string
                              description: Floor.
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: Floor.
                                spa: Piso
                                por: Apartamento
                            apartment:
                              type: string
                              description: Department.
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: Department.
                                spa: Departmento
                                por: Departamento
                    barcode:
                      type: object
                      description: Barcode information.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Barcode information.
                        spa: Información de código de barra
                        por: Informação de código de barra
                      properties:
                        type:
                          $ref: '#/components/schemas/barcode_type'
                        content:
                          type: string
                          description: Barcode generated.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Barcode generated.
                            spa: Código de barras generado
                            por: Código de barras gerado
                        width:
                          type: number
                          description: Width of barcode.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Width of barcode.
                            spa: Ancho del código de barras
                            por: Largura do código de barras
                        height:
                          type: number
                          description: Height of barcode.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Height of barcode.
                            spa: Altura del código de barras
                            por: Altura do código de barras
                application_fee:
                  type: number
                  description: Fee collected by a marketplace or Mercado Pago Application.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Fee collected by a marketplace or Mercado Pago Application.
                    spa: Comisión recolectada por el marketplace o por Mercado Pago
                    por: Comissão coletadas pelo mercado ou pelo Mercado Pago
                binary_mode:
                  type: boolean
                  description: When set to TRUE, payments can only be approved or rejected. Otherwise they can also result in_process.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: When set to TRUE, payments can only be approved or rejected. Otherwise they can also result in_process.
                    spa: Cuando se configura como TRUE los pagos sólo pueden resultar aprobados o rechazados. Caso contrario también pueden resultar in_process.
                    por: Quando definido como TRUE, os pagamentos só podem ser aprovados ou rejeitados. Caso contrário, eles também podem resultar in_process.
                callback_url:
                  type: string
                  description: 
                    URL where mercadopago does the final redirect (only for bank transfers).
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: URL where mercadopago does the final redirect (only for bank transfers).
                    spa: URL a la cual Mercado Pago hace la redirección final (sólo para transferencia bancaria).
                    por: URL para a qual o Mercado Pago faz o redirecionamento final (apenas para transferência bancária).
                campaign_id:
                  type: number
                  description: Discount campaign ID.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Discount campaign ID.
                    spa: Identificador de la campaña de descuento
                    por: Identificador da campanha de desconto
                capture:
                  type: boolean
                  description: 
                    Determines if the payment should be captured (true, default value) or just reserved (false).
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Determines if the payment should be captured (true, default value) or just reserved (false).
                    spa: Determina si el pago debe ser capturado(true, default value) o solo reservado(false).
                    por: Determina se o pagamento deve ser capturado(true, default value), ou apenas reservado(false).
                coupon_amount:
                  type: number
                  description: Amount of the coupon discount.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Amount of the coupon discount.
                    spa: Monto del cupón de descuento
                    por: Valor do cupom de desconto
                coupon_code:
                  type: string
                  description: Discount campaign with a specific code.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Discount campaign with a specific code.
                    spa: Campaña de descuento con un código específico
                    por: Campanha de desconto com um código específico
                description:
                  type: string
                  description: Payment reason or item title.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Payment reason or item title.
                    spa: Razón de pago o título de ítem
                    por: Razão de pagamento ou título do item
                  example: Payment for product
                differential_pricing_id:
                  type: number
                  description: Id of the scheme for the absorption of financing fee.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Id of the scheme for the absorption of financing fee.
                    spa: Identificador del esquema de absorción del costo financiero
                    por: Id do esquema de absorção do custo financeiro
                date_of_expiration:
                  type: string
                  format: date
                  description: Payment´s expiration date.
                external_reference:
                  type: string
                  description: ID given by the merchant in their system.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: ID given by the merchant in their system.
                    spa: Identificador provisto por el vendedor en su sistema
                    por: Identificação fornecida pelo vendedor em seu sistema
                  example: MP0001
                installments:
                  type: number
                  description: Number of installments selected.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Number of installments selected.
                    spa: Cantidad seleccionada de cuotas
                    por: Número de parcelas selecionado
                  required: true
                  example: 1
                issuer_id:
                  type: string
                  description: Payment method issuer.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Payment method issuer.
                    spa: Identificador del emisor del medio de pago
                    por: Id do emitente do meio de pagamento
                  required: true
                metadata:
                  type: object
                  description: The metadata object shows (if used in the integration) the JSON sent by the client containing additional information that needs to be recorded in the payment.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: The metadata object shows (if used in the integration) the JSON sent by the client containing additional information that needs to be recorded in the payment.
                    spa: En el objeto metadata se muestra (en caso de ser utilizado en la integración) el JSON enviado por el cliente con información complementaria que necesite mantener registrada en el pago.
                    por: O objeto de metadata mostra (se usado na integração) o JSON enviado pelo cliente com informações adicionais que precisam ser registradas no pagamento.
                notification_url:
                  type: string
                  description: Notifications URL available to receive notifications of events related to Payment.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Notifications URL available to receive notifications of events related to Payment.
                    spa: URL de Notificaciones disponibilizada para recibir las notificaciones de los eventos relacionados al Pago.
                    por: URL de notificações disponível para receber notificações de eventos relacionados ao Pagamento.
                payer:
                  type: object
                  description: Identifies the buyer.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Identifies the buyer.
                    spa: Identificador del pagador
                    por: Id do pagador
                  required: true
                  properties:
                    entity_type:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/entity_type'
                    type:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/payer_type'
                    id:
                      type: string
                      description: Identification of the associated payer.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Identification of the associated payer.
                        spa: Identificación del pagador asociado
                        por: Identificação do pagador associado
                    email:
                      type: string
                      description: Email associated to the payer. This value will only return a response when status=approved, status=refunded or status=charged_back
                      required: true
                    identification:
                      type: object
                      description: Personal identification. This value will only return a response when status=approved, status=refunded or status=charged_back
                      properties:
                        type:
                          type: string
                          description: Identification type.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Identification type.
                            spa: Tipo de identificación
                            por: Tipo de identificação
                        number:
                          type: string
                          description: Identification number.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Identification number.
                            spa: Número de identificación
                            por: Número de identificação
                    first_name:
                      type: string
                      description: First name of the associated payer.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: First name of the associated payer.
                        spa: Nombre del pagador asociado
                        por: Nome do pagador associado
                    last_name:
                      type: string
                      description: Last name of the associated payer.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Last name of the associated payer.
                        spa: Apellido del pagador asociado
                        por: Sobrenome do pagante associado
                payment_method_id:
                  type: string
                  description: Payment method identifier. Indicates the ID of the payment method selected to make the payment.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Payment method identifier. Indicates the ID of the payment method selected to make the payment.
                    spa: Identificador del medio de pago. Indica el ID del medio de pago seleccionado para realizar el pago.
                    por: Id do meio de pagamento. Indica o ID do meio de pagamento selecionado para efetuar o pagamento.
                  required: true
                  example: visa
                statement_descriptor:
                  type: string
                  description: Description that the payment will appear with in the card statement (eg MERCADOPAGO)
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Description that the payment will appear with in the card statement (eg MERCADOPAGO)
                    spa: Descripción con la que aparecerá el pago en el resumen de tarjeta (ej. MERCADOPAGO)
                    por: Descrição com a qual o pagamento aparecerá no resumo do cartão (ex. MERCADOPAGO)
                token:
                  type: string
                  description: Card token ID. (Required for credit card)
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Card token ID. (Required for credit card)
                    spa: Identificador de card token. (Obligatorio para tarjeta de crédito)
                    por: Identificador de token card. (Obrigatório para cartão de crédito)
                  required: true
                transaction_amount:
                  type: number
                  description: Product cost.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Product cost.
                    spa: Costo del producto
                    por: Custo do produto
                  required: true
                  example: 58.8
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: number
                    example: 20359978
                    description: Unique Payment Identifier, automatically generated by Mercado Pago
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Unique Payment Identifier, automatically generated by Mercado Pago
                      spa: Identificador único del pago, generado automáticamente por Mercado Pago
                      por: Identificador único de pagamento, gerado automaticamente pelo Mercado Pago
                  date_created:
                    type: string
                    example: 2019-07-10T14:47:58.000Z
                    description: Payment creation date.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Payment creation date.
                      spa: Fecha de creación del Pago.
                      por: Data de criação do pagamento.
                  date_approved:
                    type: string
                    example: 2019-07-10T14:47:58.000Z
                    description: Payment approval date. A payment can be generated in an intermediate state and then approved, so the creation date will not always coincide with the Approval Date.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Payment approval date. A payment can be generated in an intermediate state and then approved, so the creation date will not always coincide with the Approval Date.
                      spa: Fecha de aprobación del Pago. Un pago puede generarse en un estado intermedio y luego ser aprobado, por tanto la fecha de creación no siempre coincidirá con la Fecha de Aprobación.
                      por: Data de aprovação do pagamento. Um pagamento pode ser gerado em um estado intermediário e depois aprovado, portanto, a data de criação nem sempre coincidirá com a Data de Aprovação.
                  date_last_updated:
                    type: string
                    example: 2019-07-10T14:47:58.000Z
                    description: Date on which the last payment event was recorded.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Date on which the last payment event was recorded.
                      spa: Fecha en la que se registró el ultimo evento sobre el pago.
                      por: Data em que o último evento de pagamento foi registrado.
                  date_of_expiration:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: Deadline to make the Payment through an off payment method (in cash)
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Deadline to make the Payment through an off payment method (in cash)
                      spa: Fecha límite para realizar el Pago a través de un medio de pago off (en efectivo)
                      por: Prazo para efetuar o Pagamento através de um método de pagamento à vista (em dinheiro)
                  money_release_date:
                    type: string
                    example: 2019-07-24T14:47:58.000Z
                    description: Date on which the payment is settled (available) in the Collector´s Mercado Pago account
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Date on which the payment is settled (available) in the Collector´s Mercado Pago account
                      spa: Fecha en la que el pago se encuentra liquidado (disponible) en la cuenta de Mercado Pago del Collector
                      por: Data em que o pagamento é liquidado (disponível) na conta Mercado Pago do Collector
                  operation_type:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/operation_type'
                  issuer_id:
                    type: string
                    example: 25
                    description: Identifier of the issuer of the payment method.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Identifier of the issuer of the payment method.
                      spa: Identificador del emisor del medio de pago
                      por: Identificador do emissor do meio de pagamento
                  payment_method_id:
                    type: string
                    example: visa
                    description: Payment method identifier. Indicates the ID of the payment method selected to make the payment.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Payment method identifier. Indicates the ID of the payment method selected to make the payment.
                      spa: Identificador del medio de pago. Indica el ID del medio de pago seleccionado para realizar el pago.
                      por: Id do meio de pagamento. Indica o ID do meio de pagamento selecionado para efetuar o pagamento.
                  payment_type_id:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/payment_type_id'
                  status:
                   $ref: '#/components/schemas/status'
                  status_detail:
                    type: string
                    example: accredited
                    description: Detail in which the Collection resulted
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Detail in which the Collection resulted
                      spa: Detalle en el que resultó el Cobro
                      por: Detalhe em que resultou a Coleção
                    enum:
                      - Accredited -- credited payment.
                      - pending_contingency -- the payment is being processed.
                      - pending_review_manual -- the payment is under review to determine its approval or rejection.
                      - cc_rejected_bad_filled_date -- incorrect expiration date.
                      - cc_rejected_bad_filled_other -- incorrect card details.
                      - cc_rejected_bad_filled_security_code -- incorrect CVV.
                      - cc_rejected_blacklist -- the card is on a black list for theft/complaints/fraud.
                      - cc_rejected_call_for_authorize -- the means of payment requires prior authorization of the amount of the operation.
                      - cc_rejected_card_disabled -- the card is inactive.
                      - cc_rejected_duplicated_payment -- transacción duplicada.
                      - cc_rejected_high_risk -- rechazo por Prevención de Fraude.
                      - cc_rejected_insufficient_amount -- insufficient amount.
                      - cc_rejected_invalid_installments -- invalid number of installments.
                      - cc_rejected_max_attempts -- exceeded maximum number of attempts.
                      - cc_rejected_other_reason -- generic error.
                  currency_id:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/currency_id'
                  description:
                    type: string
                    example: 
                      Point Mini a maquininha que dá o dinheiro de suas vendas
                      na hora
                    description: Description sent in the payment creation request.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Description sent in the payment creation request.
                      spa: Descripción enviada en la solicitud de creación del Pago.
                      por: Descrição enviada na solicitação de criação de pagamento.
                  live_mode:
                    type: boolean
                    description: Indicates whether the Payment was made in a production environment or in a Test environment. If TRUE, then the chargeback will be processed in production mode. If FALSE, then the chargeback will be processed in sandbox mode.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Indicates whether the Payment was made in a production environment or in a Test environment. If TRUE, then the chargeback will be processed in production mode. If FALSE, then the chargeback will be processed in sandbox mode.
                      spa: Indica si el Pago se realizó en ambiente productivo o en un ambiente de Test. Si es TRUE, el contracargo se procesará en modo de producción. Si es FALSE, el contracargo se procesará en modo sandbox.
                      por: Indica se o Pagamento foi feito em ambiente de produção ou em ambiente de Teste. Se TRUE, o estorno será processado em modo de produção. Se FALSE, o estorno será processado no modo sandbox.
                  sponsor_id:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: Identifier of the Partners Mercado Pago account. It is used to identify if the integration was performed by a partner.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Identifier of the Partners Mercado Pago account. It is used to identify if the integration was performed by a partner.
                      spa: Identificador de la cuenta de Mercado Pago del Partner. Se utiliza para identificar si la integración fue realizada por algún partner.
                      por: Identificador da conta Mercado Pago do Partnet. É usado para identificar se a integração foi realizada por um partner.
                  authorization_code:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: Transaction authorization code.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Transaction authorization code.
                      spa: Código de autorización de la transacción.
                      por: Código de autorização de transação.
                  money_release_schema:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: Money release schema
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Money release schema
                      spa: Esquema de liberación de dinero
                      por: Esquema de liberação de dinheiro
                  taxes_amount:
                    type: number
                    example: 0
                    description: Corresponds to the tax values ​​calculated for the payment.
                    x-description-i18n:

        '400':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 1--Params Error.
                      - 3--Token must be for test.
                      - 5--Must provide your access_token to proceed.
                      - 23--The following parameters must be valid date and format (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssz) date_of_expiration.
                      - 1000--Number of rows exceeded the limits.
                      - 1001--Date format must be yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ.
                      - 2001--Already posted the same request in the last minute.
                      - 2002--Customer not found.
                      - 2004--POST to Gateway Transactions API fail.
                      - 2006--Card Token not found.
                      - 2007--Connection to Card Token API fail.
                      - 2009--Card token issuer can't be null.
                      - 2060--The customer can't be equal to the collector.
                      - 3000--You must provide your cardholder_name with your card data.
                      - 3001--You must provide your cardissuer_id with your card data.
                      - 3003--Invalid card_token_id.
                      - 3004--Invalid parameter site_id.
                      - 3005--Not valid action, the resource is in a state that does not allow this operation. For more information see the state that has the resource.
                      - 3006--Invalid parameter cardtoken_id.
                      - 3007--The parameter client_id can not be null or empty.
                      - 3008--Not found Cardtoken.
                      - 3009--unauthorized client_id.
                      - 3010--Not found card on whitelist.

    get:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-pro'

      summary: Search payments

        eng: Search payments

        por: Buscar em pagamentos
      description: Search and return payments made in the last twelve months from the search date
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Search and return payments made in the last twelve months from the search date
        spa: Busca y retorna los pagos hechos en los último doce meses desde la fecha de pago
        por: Pesquisa e retorna pagamentos efetuados nos últimos doze meses a partir da data de pesquisa
      parameters:
        - name: sort
          in: query
          description: Define the field to sort
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Define the field to sort
            spa: Define el campo para ordenar
            por: Define o campo para ordenação
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: date_created
        - name: criteria
          in: query
          description: The criteria result
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: The criteria result
            spa: Filtro utilizado en la búsqueda
            por: O filtro utilizado na pesquisa
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: desc
        - name: external_reference
          in: query
          description: Unique identifier sent by the seller to relate the payment_id generated by Mercado Pago, with the ID of its system.

            eng: Unique identifier sent by the seller to relate the payment_id generated by Mercado Pago, with the ID of its system.

components:
  schemas:
    operation_type:
      type: string
      description: Payment type.
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Payment type.
        spa: Tipo de pago
        por: Tipo de pagamento
      enum:
        - regular_payment -- Typification by default of a purchase being paid using Mercado Pago.
        - money_transfer -- Funds transfer between two users.
        - recurring_payment -- Automatic recurring payment due to an active user subscription.
        - account_fund -- Money income in the user's account.
        - payment_addition -- Addition of money to an existing payment, made through a Mercado Pago account.
        - cellphone_recharge -- Recharge of a user's cellphone account.
        - pos_payment -- Payment done through a Point of Sale.
    entity_type:
      type: string
      description: Entity type of the payer (only for bank transfers).
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Entity type of the payer (only for bank transfers).
        spa: Tipo de entidad del pagador (sólo para transferencias bancarias)
        por: Tipo de entidade do pagador (apenas para transferências bancárias)
      example: individual
      enum:
        - individual -- Payer is individual.
        - association -- Payer is an association.
    payer_type:
      type: string
      description: Identification type of the associated payer (mandatory if the Payer is a Customer).
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Identification type of the associated payer (mandatory if the Payer is a Customer).
        spa: Tipo de identificación del pagador asociado (requerido si el pagador es un cliente)
        por: Tipo de identificação do pagador associado (se necessário o pagador é um cliente)
      example: customer
      enum:
        - customer -- Payer is a Customer and belongs to the collector.
        - registered -- The account corresponds to a Mercado Pago registered user.
        - guest -- The payer doesn't have an account.
    currency_id:
      type: string
      description: ID of the currency used in the payment.
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: ID of the currency used in the payment.
        spa: Identificador de la moneda utilizada en el pago
        por: Identificador da moeda utilizada no pagamento
      example: BRL
      enum:
        - ARS -- Argentine peso.
        - BRL -- Brazilian real.
        - CLP -- Chilean peso.
        - MXN -- Mexican peso.
        - COP -- Colombian peso.
        - PEN -- Peruvian sol.
        - UYU -- Uruguayan peso.
    fee_details_type:
      type: string
      description: Fee detail.
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Fee detail.
        spa: Detalle de comisión
        por: Detalhe de comissão
      example: coupon_fee
      enum:
        - mercadopago_fee -- Cost for using Mercado Pago.
        - coupon_fee -- Discount given by a coupon.
        - financing_fee -- Cost of financing.
        - shipping_fee -- Shipping cost.
        - application_fee -- Marketplace comision for the service.
        - discount_fee -- Discount given by the seller through cost absorption.
    fee_payer:
      type: string
      description: Who absorbs the cost.
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Who absorbs the cost.
        spa: Indica quién absorve el costo de la comisión
        por: Quem absorve o custo da comissão
      example: payer
      enum:
        - collector -- The seller absorbs the cost.
        - payer -- The buyer absorbs the cost.
    status:
      type: string
      example: approved
      description: Payment status.
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Payment status.
        spa: Estado del pago
        por: Estado do pagamento
      enum:
        - pending -- The user has not yet completed the payment process.
        - approved -- The payment has been approved and accredited.
        - authorized -- The payment has been authorized but not captured yet.
        - in_process -- Payment is being reviewed.
        - in_mediation -- Users have initiated a dispute.
        - rejected -- Payment was rejected. The user may retry payment.
        - cancelled -- Payment was cancelled by one of the parties or because time for payment has expired
        - refunded -- Payment was refunded to the user.
        - charged_back -- A chargeback was made in the buyer’s credit card.
    payment_type_id:
      type: string
      description: Type of payment method chosen.
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Type of payment method chosen.
        spa: Tipo del medio de pago elegido
        por: Tipo do meio de pagamento escolhido
      example: credit_card
      enum:
        - account_money -- Money in the Mercado Pago account.
        - ticket -- Printed ticket.
        - bank_transfer -- Wire transfer.
        - atm -- Payment by ATM.
        - credit_card -- Payment by credit card.
        - debit_card -- Payment by debit card.
        - prepaid_card -- Payment by prepaid card.
    refund_source_type:
      type: string
      description: Type of user who issued the refund.
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Type of user who issued the refund.
        spa: Tipo de usuario que hizo el reembolso
        por: Tipo de usuário que fez o reembolso
      example: collector
      enum:
        - collector -- The collector issued the refund.
        - operator -- The refund was made by an account's operator.
        - admin -- The refund was made by a Mercado Pago administrator.
        - bpp -- The refund was made by the Mercado Pago's Buyer Protection Program
    barcode_type:
      type: String
      description: Encoding type.
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Encoding type.
        spa: Tipo de encoding
        por: Tipo de encoding
      enum:
        - UCC/EAN 128 -- Encodes data using the Code 128 symbology.
        - Code128C -- High-density alphanumeric code.
        - Code39 -- Media density code.
